personal-info.title: Fullstack Developer

paragraphs.first: Hello, I am Marcelo Mafra, a passionate full-stack developer dedicated to creating innovative digital solutions. With proficiency in TS, JS, ReactJS, and NodeJS, my technological journey has led me to master both front-end and back-end web development.
paragraphs.second: From user interface design to complex system architecture, I am always in pursuit of technical excellence and innovation. I am driven by the opportunity to face new challenges and constantly learn, seeking ways to enhance my skills and contribute to the success of the projects I am involved in.
paragraphs.third: I am eager to collaborate on exciting projects.

resumeParagraph.first: Living in Florian√≥polis - SC, Brazil. At 17 years old, I am a Fullstack Developer.
resumeParagraph.second: I have intermediate skills in English, and my native language is Portuguese. Besides software development, my interests include listening to music, exercising, playing chess, and reading a good book.

personal-info.interests: I am passionate about neuroscience, philosophy, and self-help. I love diving into books that expand my understanding of the human brain, existence, and personal growth. Music is a significant part of my life. It inspires me, calms me, and energizes me. I am always on the lookout for new music to add to my playlist. Additionally, I am an enthusiast of Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. This year, I am celebrating my tenth year of training and, at 17 years old, I am a red belt. Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu has taught me discipline, resilience, and the art of strategy. I have participated in approximately 40 championships, each an opportunity to learn and improve.
